name: @three.ez/instanced-mesh-test
description: InstancedMesh2 enhances three.js's InstancedMesh by simplifying instance management, including visibility control and transformations. It introduces frustum culling for each instance, improving performance.
author: Andrea Gargaro <devgargaro@gmail.com>

scripts.publish-beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version false && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
